content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting tiahuanaco, an old archeological site on the border of titicaca lake.
i've only realized about the ufo many months when i was looking the photos i've shooted there.
the object was very far in the direction of the mountains, out of airways path, cause the sllp or la paz international airport is some dozens miles from there, it doesnt look or behave like an aeroplane. well the photo is attached. it says everything.
content.summary: Eliptical shape, bright

content.detailedDescription: A few minutes after midnight i received a text from a friend to look west out my window to view a strange object. i went out on my deck and observed red or orange swirling pulsating   lights that were stationary in the western sky.It appeared to be in the distant sky and was  about the altitude of an airplane. i observed it for a few minutes and went back inside my house. i went back outside a couple minutes later but the  object was gone. it kind of freaked me out a little.
content.summary: Looked out on my deck and saw a pulsating object that appeared to be red or orange. was in a stationary position for several minutes. when i wen back out to see it again it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: We were camping at big knob campground which is mi state park located right on lake mi. we arrived back at camp late and noticed it was the first clear night to stargaze. we took a walk to the beach just after midnight hoping to catch some meteor showers and enjoy the stars with no light pollution. after identifying some constellations, we gazed towards the lake waiting for shooting stars. i immediately noticed a star that was far below the rest over the water. within seconds i witnessed unnatural movement and focused in on it. i called attention  to it by my partner and we watched the object for 15 to 20 min. at times it appeared to hover over the horizon. the most amazing moments happened when we witnessed it zigzag and (very quickly) to the east and west and would appear to be descending into the lake, then suddenly shoot upwards again. we also observed color changes from white to pink, then red and blue. at one point it appeared as though a white beam was being emitted, like a spotlight, very briefly. it was cool and the water had very little wave activity. the zig zagging was so fast and foreign, we are sure it was no aircraft we are accustomed to (2 army vets). it was not a plane or helicopter. although we are very open minded, avid outdoor enthusiasts and love looking at the sky, we have never witnessed anything like this. we both had goose bumps, and the hair on mu arms was standing up. so many emotions ran through our minds, the first of which "who else is seeing this?" also, i was angry that i left my video cmera at home. we thought about waking up others in the campsite (which was very quiet)  but were afraid when we came back it would be gone. we were alarmed enough that our dog was uneasy. (out of character for him). i tried to videotape with my cell phone but when we got back there was nothing visual at all. we only have the audio which is embarrasing because i used a lot of profanity but didnt realize it at the time. since then we have been searching the net for similar stories and are compelled to seek similar experiences. we definitely want to know more and hope that reporting now may find someone else with a corroborated version. came across this site in our search and have broadened our horizons on this ufo thing a little. hope our story helps ultimately, even if just a little. we feel like no one will believe us, and without photogrphic evidence, it will just be "our awakening".
content.summary: Glowing orb beneath starline over lake mi

content.detailedDescription: On the night of october 23 2014, i witnessed multiple flying orange orbs outside in my backyard.
content.summary: Glowing orange orb

content.detailedDescription: 3 large  hovering light in formation , with many small lights linear to larger ones especially. when filming, witnessed many other lights blinking. then one larger light went out, followed by the smaller lights.
content.summary: Strange hovering light formation

content.detailedDescription:
In my back yard with a headache. sat down, leaned back, rest my head on chair with closed eyes. i was facing northwards. when i opened my eyes i saw a tiny white dot in the sky through the leaves of the tree. assumed it was a plane or a high flying bird but the orb of light did not move at all. after about 3-5 min of waiting for the light to move i thought, "could be a ufo?" 

i ran in the house, yelled at my daughter, "there's a ufo outside!", grabbed my camera, and dashed back into the yard. was sure the light would be gone when i got back outside but it still hovered in the exact same spot. i sat in the chair, popped on my zoom lens and maxed it out. it was still nothing but a blob of white light on the view screen. 

by this time i was excited because i didn't know what could hover motionless in the sky for so long. i noted that all the dogs in the neighborhood were barking and wondered if the light had something to do with it. i took more photos then moved to the drive way for a clearer shot of the object. 

i got one shot off and noticed the tiny form of a turkey vulture soar through the sky near the orb. i realized i was still wearing my sunglasses and took them off so i could focus better. when i looked through the viewfinder to find the ufo i couldn't see it. i put my glasses back on and it was there again. i took the glasses off and on a couple of times and each time they were off i couldn't see the orb in the sky. i put my glasses on took a quick shot trying to capture the vulture and the orb in the same photo. at this time the corners of my viewfinder went dark and i thought my camera was going to shut off or finally conk out. 

i looked down at my viewfinder to see if i'd captured them both in the same shot. it looked like i hadn't so i looked upward again to find the orb. it was gone! i spun and scanned the sky and saw the orb zipping away with the speed of a meteor toward the south east. it whipped past the moon and faded into the distance. 

seeing the unbelievable speed with which the orb escaped left now doubt in my mind i had just witnessed and potentially captured on camera... an actual ufo. 

*note, my sunglasses are polarized
content.summary: Hovering orb of light mid afternoon

content.detailedDescription: About 11:00 pm i was watching tv in an open 3-season room. i heard a roaring noise outside that got alarmingly loud. it soundrd like a helicopter was landing on the roof. i went outside to look. a very large elongated triangular air vrhicle was flying at a medium speed from south east to northwest. it was a clear, calm night. i could see the object as a darkness against the sky with folur or five lights, one at the front abd four around the tail, i did not have time to get a camera. it just kept going over the horizon.
content.summary: Elongated diamond shape four or five lights straight flight se to nw,

content.detailedDescription: Walking towards my house about 4 or 5 houses up the block. i looked up and saw 3 red lights that didn't look like regular aircraft. red lights were surrounded by a halo, at first i thought lanterns, paper, the lead light seemed to move ahead of the 2 others , the 2 in back continued on but were changing from being side to side, to 1 being behind the other , then they changed position again as they moved forward. i was wondering, am i really seeing this, there was no sound and there was a military aircraft in the area at the same time., which made me think something was up. i lost sight when the object continued west and out of sight.
content.summary: Saw 3 red lights coming over tops of houses across street, watched until could no longer be seen

content.detailedDescription: I was going for a post-dinner walk with my fiance, when i saw a very fast flying ufo, that at first looked like a regular plane, then saw a slight blip of brighter light, then it was gone, and it had accelerated straight away from earth and out of our atmosphere at a jaw dropping speed! i felt like i was in shock, and excitingly shouted at my lady to also look up into the sky and try to see what i was seeing, at the object had gone so far so fast, it was then completely out of sight and without a trace left behind.
content.summary: Very fast flying ufo, that at first looked like a regular plane, then proceeded to accelerate quickly

content.detailedDescription: I just had the thought to start taking photographs of the sun set as we were on our way towards canoe creek to do some fishing so took a few shots with htc 10 out my friends car while he was driving to the creek i didn't notice anything until i look at the photos after and had seen a green most translucent thing just looking for answers i don't know if it a ufo that why iive sent the pictures to make your own theory.
content.summary: I don't know i have sent pictures hoping some one could tell me they were taken on an htc 10 just had a thought to start taking pics of sun set and later when looked at photos noticed the weird green thing there at tree different points .

content.detailedDescription: I was taking photos of the milky way in trona pinnacles and these things appear in one of my photo only. that is all i have.
content.summary: I was taking long exposure of milky way and later on found it on one picture only.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to a local country outing that a community was hosting. i had some friends that played a set of music and visual exploration. they have a theme of humanity and its quest to understand our place in the cosmos, among other worlds and possible entities. i was impressed with their presentation and spiritual context of their show. near the end i had a profound inner meditation that seemed to bring me in tune with my inner atoms and their connection to the cosmos. at one point i felt as the everything became light and a beam/ flash of light captured my experience. they shortly ended their set along with my experience.  

i then joined my friends for star and meteor gazing. as dawn was nearing, i noticed a bright "star' or light in the sky. in a few seconds, it performed a spiral twist, then disappeared. it reappeared a short distance away and repeated the spiral twist. a few times during the twist, a similar flash of light beamed directly into my vision. my other friends saw the light with twists, but not the intense beam/flash. this continued for several minutes each time disappearing and reappearing with the same spiral twist. a few of my friends have told me about some strange sightings in the past, without me fully believing their stories. i've had a couple other experiences in the past, but this was a far more intriguing display. i described my experience to a friend who told me about this sight to report such events.
content.summary: Bright light high in sky that did a spiral twist including direction of light beam, then disappeared & reappeared repeating same pattern for about 5 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were camping along the mendocino coast, 20 miles north of fort bragg. the night sky was clear with no cloud cover. the stars and milky way were clear to eye. while we were star gazing, we immediately noticed 8 orange-red "large" star shaped glowing lights directly over the southern horizon. they were hovering and slowly moving up, then toward each other, then moving in opposite directions with no clear flight path. they began dissolving into one another until there was only one larger orange light which then began moving west and then disappeared. 5 minutes larger 2 more appeared, did the same movements for about 10 minutes and then each dissolved. all of these objects had no particular flight path and changed direction several times before blinking out. 

we felt surprised and amazed as to what we were seeing. i have a few close friends who are pilots and am very aware of the flight paths of planes and helicopters. these lights did not move in either fashion.
content.summary: Witnessed 9 ufos for 35 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Son an i were driving to see a movie on i290 heading n/nw about 2/3 miles before getting to woodfield mall in schaumburg. we saw this light behind the clouds up and to our left (we were driving north). 

the clouds were covering it a little, but it seemed come in and out of view, as if we never saw the whole thing. 

it seemed to have legs or a jagged skirt at times. i could not keep an eye on it as i was driving.
content.summary: White glowing orb with feet or trail, reminded me of a pacman gobbler

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside in my backyard smoking a cigarette. when i was putting it out & noticed the 3 orangeish slightly dim lights together in 20-30Â° angle. told my father & he also was watching. he went to get shoes on as i was still watching. i observed the 3 fade away slowly & / or appear moving towards the north slightly west horizon. my father did not see the 3 as they faded. he then noticed they were there again. however, there were only 2 now. i thought it was odd how they just reappeared in the 1st position where i first seen them. they seemed slightly brighter than when i first saw them. my father & i watched / observed them asking and talking to each other. asked what the heck & what are those. we both thought they were strange. the 2 also seemed to move away toward the horizon & also faded away / vanished. the right one however seemed to move upward toward the horizon instead of a straight line path towards it. my 1st thought was maybe they are flares but they weren't too bright & were hovering. i then thought chinese lanterns but when i seen the 2 balls / orbs of light reappear. i thought if they were chinese lanterns, we would've seen them ascend upwards slowly, but the 2 orbs that appeared or returned were already in the air floating or hovering. when the lights were out, i didn't see an object, craft, airplane, blimp, or helicopter where they were. occasionally, we have airplanes fly overhead with & without landing lights as well as helicopters flying at low heights. however, the objects weren't any & did not hear an engine, any sort of wind turbulence, or any noise from these light orbs. i have no idea what i saw. i thought maybe it's some kind of energy being released from the earth or some atmospheric anomaly, possibly both. i lost sight of the 1st 3 orbs/lights gradually as the lights appeared to fade away and / or move towards the horizon. the second set of 2 lights also did the same. the only difference was that the right orb / light appeared to move slightly upward as well as fading or moving towards the horizon. i didn't want to go inside to grab my phone to take a picture or video as i didn't want to lose sight of it as it was something i haven't seen. my conclusion is that they were something i've never seen before and definitely unexplainable / unidentified.

also, i'd like to remain anonymous.
content.summary: Saw 3 dimmish orangeish / slighly yellowish lights in a sort of angled formation. they faded / disappeared 30-45sec later. 2 reappeared where 1st observed.

content.detailedDescription: When i was returing from my tution classes i see many lights in sky on that time i was in middel of forest road the lights moving fastly i never anything moving that fast i was shocked i can't explain and after 5 minutes approx suddenly the lights gone
content.summary: When i was returning from my tution classes i see many lights in sky they are moving very fastly

content.detailedDescription: This picture was taken on june 10, 2016 at the crossroads of highway 95 & pete henrichs rd., just outside of yerington, nevada. i was a passenger in a moving vehicle & was taking digital photos of geological formations. i did not see this ufo with my naked eye; it wasn't until i was viewing the pictures on august 8, 2016 of our trip from reno, nevada to las vegas, nevada that i noticed the ufo in the picture.
content.summary: Not witnessed with the naked eye; object observed in picture after the event.

content.detailedDescription: Please read the attachments as they will explain everything .....I took photos but they didn't come out ..
content.summary: Please read the attachments . they will explain everything

content.detailedDescription:
I took my dog out for her last bathroom break of the day. i was looking up
for the big dipper when i noticed a white object flying against the normal
direction for airplane traffic in my area. i watched it flying in a straight line path for about 20 seconds and then it started flying in a
zig zag pattern. it would have starts and stops. it seemed to be putting
on a show for me. all of its actions remained in the 90-95% angle. there
is no way that it could have been terrestrial. the object was still flying
above me when i went back inside.
content.summary: White object flying erracticly in sky

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was 9 at the time and remember it very clearly to this day. i was outside my house and about a couple houses up the street i was playing and running around. it was dusk, and about to be fully dark. i was about to go inside for the night. then at the corner of my eye i saw something quickly appear about 300-500 feet, not above me but in front of me to the left a little. it was as if a helicopter was flying in place, because the fly pretty low to the ground compared to airplanes, that's what i thought it was for a split second but i saw it clearly. it made almost no noise at all. it looked like your typical ufo. it had 3 large lights on the diameter of the ufo and like two metal bars wraped around the whole thing it was above and below the lights it was spinning in the same direction around the ufo. i just stood there staring at it wondering if it was real and about after a minute it very fastly flew off. it made almost no noise at all. i knew it wasn't an airplane because of the speed it had.I wasn't scared just a little wierded out, i went inside to tell my parents but of course they didn't believe me. i just thought about it for a few days and slowly it just went to the back of my mind.
content.summary: I was playing out in the streets when i saw from a little distance away a ufo &  i stood there for a min & looked at it while it just sat there with it's lights pulsing & something on it spinning around the diameter of the ufo. then very fast it hovered a

content.detailedDescription: Sitting out in the backyard while taking the dog out for the night, when in a flash this bright ball looking object flew past going west. it was fast, bright and made no noise.
content.summary: Ball like shape, very bright and moved quickly across the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Driving car
 
was checking traffic light,waiting for the green light i was looking up
 
first thought of shooting star but it was too low
content.summary: Red and  yellow fast streak of sparkling light from east to west direction

content.detailedDescription: We were on a motorcycle then we saw a red like dot, it was still then moved kinda slow and then fast, and then completely stopped and then it stayed still for about 5 seconds then poof it disappeared just like that it was gone, me and my son both saw the thing and both agreed we had saw the same object, and both saw the same flight or movements of this object, we couldn't believe what we were seeing, and were further perplexed when it fanished !!!
content.summary: Redish glowing orb in sky like star, then took off at amazing speed, then stoped then vanished !!

content.detailedDescription: It is the second time i have seen the triangular ufo in 2 months
content.summary: Triangular ufo prowling the city
content.locationName: Buenos Aires, Autonomous City of Buenos Aires

content.detailedDescription: I was outside relaxing at night when i saw an odd star blink once where no star or light existed. it was just left of the bottom left star of the big dipper. i do not believe it was of this earth. it struck me as odd and i watched for 4 minutes and the light did not return. it was copper gold in color with a hint of yellow at the outside rim and red at the center. it was the first star left of phecda it was really close to it that nearby star just under it maybe.
content.summary: Saw a blink at the left of the bottom left of the big dipper constilation

content.detailedDescription: About 2 weeks back around 1 in the morning i was just running down the road when i notice a flash in the sky which had no resemblence of a shooting star, it was slowly moving and was only visible for 2-3 seconds, yesterday at 8pm i had glanced at the sky and saw what i think is the same bright light hovering, disappearing and reappearing in other parts of the sky and after a few minutes it vanished, the next day (today) i saw the same light behaving the same as the day before, however this time i ran and got my mom and dad who saw it.
content.summary: Looked in sky and saw small white orb hovering and moving and at times teleporting to other parts of sky and saw again the next day at same time  (today)

content.detailedDescription:
Time was 5th april 2014_22.55 minutes italy time.
i was driving with my wife (also witness) and my son in car to home.
coordinates of the sighting are 44.042 n_10.161 e.
during the trip to home the street goes on mountains and beside the street there is a black railing, always in the dark.It was glowing with segmented blue lights like projected on it.So i've slowed down the car to see that, and after few meters passed the railing the car get completely illuminated inside of these electric blue lights, in the windshield and the dashboard.
there was also a metallic and cyclic sound in my ears so i've stopped the car and i thought "man who is joking me with lasers?!"but my wife immediately push herself over the dashboard of the car and through the windshield saw on top of the car at the height of treetops this big circular set of blue electric lights of a diameter of 8-10 meters. she screams me to run away because that huge thing was practically on top of us, so i did but i was totally flashed in the eyes by those blue segmented lights, that makes me drive like 20 meters than i stop and that thing was gone. believe me seeing those thing up in the sky at 2000-5000 meters is a thing, see it at 5 meters is another matter, you really freak the hell out. that was a machine, not human,the sound i've heard was like an electronic sequence that cycling was accelerating until the vehicle was jumped away maybe vertically.
italian aeronautics received my information through the police and they get to interview me and my wife, and guess what, they were really prepared regarding the subject. i've asked to him, a leutenant"do you know other cases in the area?"and he said"i'm not authorized to talk about this".
just a last thing: during the mess this machine did on top of my car, my side window was slightly open, and the light coming from that thing hits my left eye, in the angle opposite from the nose,and it get irritated like a sunburn.But my wife saw it fully from the windshield and didn't get sunburned from it.Maybe the glass protected her from that light.
content.summary: Circle of lights rotating at 5-6 meters on top of car. diameter 7-8 metres.

content.detailedDescription: I saw 5 orange orbs hovering. one disappeared in fire flash. other 4 hovered, moved slowly and ascended out of site. i observed 1.5 minutes. not sure when started. i was driving along ocean in santa cruz, california.Objects hovered over neighborhood houses.
content.summary: 5 orange orbs hovering. one disappeared in fire flash. other 4 hovered, moved slowly and ascended out of site. i observed 1.5 minutes. not sure when started. i was driving along ocean in santa cruz. objects hovered over neighborhood houses.

content.detailedDescription:
1.  leaving gas station
2.  trying to cross the highway noticed them coming over the horizon
3.  i was not sure i knew it was not a plane
4.  there was a cluster of lights that was moving in a directional path crossing each others paths to the point they are on top of each other but still directional path
5.  make my chest hurt, a piercing pain in my chest, told his friend to stop the car and start recording...
6.  the all faded out in the same area
content.summary: Solid cluster of lights in a line formation

content.detailedDescription: My eight-year-old son and i were taking a late night walk around midnight at 4th street sw and broadway in minot, nd.  we noticed overhead a large triangular object the size of a football field.  black   with white lights, made no sounds, and moved very slowly from east to west.  we just watched it in awe for about 15 minutes.  then it turned vertically and was gone in an instant.  i wish i'd had my phone so i could have recorded this.
content.summary: Large triangle shaped craft with three lights, moved slowly overhead from east to west, then turned vertically, then disappeared.  witnessed for about 15 just south of city of minot, nd.  no sounds.  witnessed by my son and me.
